website_summaries.verdict: Overall, a nice kit with user-friendly accessories and a nicely designed vac.
pros: Has a streamlined, lightweight design that makes it easy to use
Has a squeegee top, and comes with a separate spray bottle with a microfiber top
cons: At least 1 owner of an older model by the brand complained that this model has less suction power in comparison

customer_reviews.title: No comparison to the older versions
customer_reviews.text: This unit is 3 weeks old and it's already leaking water and falling apart. This is our 3rd unit and the older units held up 1-2 years before we had issues and this one didn't even last a month. I would not recommend buying this unit.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: More trouble than it's worth
customer_reviews.text: I like the Karcher power washers, so this seemed interesting. However, this is dripping all over the place, and I thought the whole idea behind this was to have a squeegee that does not drip. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F. Vandevelde

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, has cut down the time it takes me to wash windows by around 80%. I wish the battery lasted a bit longer since I am unable to wash all of our windows in our 2,100 sq ft house in one go. Takes 2-3 charges but this way I am able to do it in chunks. Get it, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Fredrik Lundstroem

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Overhyped. Doesn’t do anything more than a normal squeegee would have accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: ABuyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This unit, while a little pricy, works very well. It cleaned our windows inside and out beautifully. Only problem is that is a little tab on the main body that holds the squeegee in place. It broke off on our first use. Probably would work ok without it, but when in a tight place, it would pull off the body. Called Karcher, explained the problem, sent a picture, and they replaced the entire unit. Very excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JackRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We had the bigger version first, lastet only 3 years. But this is still the best window vacuum we’ve had, so we bought the smaller one. It’s a lot quieter and still holds a lot of water. Thank you Karcher for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: I was sceptical
customer_reviews.text: I am a hesitant window cleaner, I hate it. But I hate dirty windows. I was dismayed when recently I used paper towels, and glass cleaner only to find the windows dirty when the afternoon sun hit them. So then I saw this product. I hate gadgets, but it was made by K'archer so I thought I would give it a try. Wow, less time than papertowels and window cleaner and no mess. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Beach boy 33

customer_reviews.title: Streakfree and Frustration Free
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! In Hawaii with the humidity and salt air we get slime on every surface that just seems to smear around. We'd spend hours trying to get things clean. With this product we do a quick wipe with hot soapy water and vac it off and have perfectly streak-free mirrors and glass. Its amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best purchase I’ve made. It still leaks and you get stains on the window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes window washing a bit less of a chore.
customer_reviews.text: For those of us who like household gadgets! Works well. After using the squeegeeing attachment, quickly wipe the glass with a lint free cloth for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This device is incredible! I just washed 6 sliders (large ones) and two front doors in about an hour. So easy to use, and the windows/doors look amazing. We typically have all windows cleaned inside and out twice a year — this device will keep them sparkling in between! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SLT

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: not worth the price. It is leaking badly when in use. The water container is so difficult to open and close it. Very annoying window/mirror vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after seeing it on the manufacturer's website. Still deciding if it was a good purchase. It works really well for one swipe. If you don't have the arm (hand) dexterity to complete the swipe on one pass, it leaves a streak as you begin again. In the areas where you do clean, it does well. However, I do have to "finish" up with a cloth/paper towels and regular window cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila I.

customer_reviews.title: Wonder product!
customer_reviews.text: Never cleaned a window so easy and just one swipe and you have a clean and beautiful window! I saw a worker on Celebrity Cruise using this and couldn’t believe how easy to clean a window. To my surprise there it was on Amazon! You won’t be disappointed in this wonderful fine!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have gotten from Amazon, the first one did not work, now this one is just couple of months old and it will not work. I have the same brand one in Florida, and it works great, however I purchased it from Lowe’s. It appears the one Amazon’s sells is defective.
customer_reviews.author: judy clouse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helper
customer_reviews.text: Great helper for washing windows, easy to use and does not leave streaks. Wish I got it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: "Chloe245"

customer_reviews.title: Easiness of cleaning windows
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Cleaning windows, mirrors, car windshield and windows is a pleasure. I wish I had vacuum like this many years ago. Thank you for great product
customer_reviews.author: Lalka

customer_reviews.title: Water leaks from the side
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of cleaning with the suction. Water leaked from the side when I tried cleaning the kitchen countertop. worked ok with window when I kept it vertical. I am not sure if I got the defective product but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival and no recourse
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival, and Amazon wants to send me to the manufacturer to sort it out. 1 hour spent in chat with support. Do not buy this here.
customer_reviews.author: Christian G

customer_reviews.title: This was a replacement Vac
customer_reviews.text: It never worked well. Hard to hold exactly right for suction power and zero liquid went in the container as it was being used. All I got were streaks! Going to return it and replace it with my old model of Intey Window Vac, now available again, which worked awesome!.
customer_reviews.author: Neen 29

customer_reviews.title: Every house needs one
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with dogs and sliding glass doors knows what your doors will look like with enough Dog licks/Sneeze, etc. My doors look great after washing with this product... Large bathroom mirrors had the same success. This is a time saver.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mitcham

customer_reviews.title: I just love this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and brilliant results. I don't mind cleaning the windows now lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Suctions very well; great time saver on large glass surfaces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy is to use. And my windows are clean in just few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anyone with lots of windows
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite household device. Makes cleaning windows so much easier and faster. My kids love using it and fight over who gets to clean the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for window cleaning. It came with a spray bottle for spraying cleaning solution which leaked, so I use a Windex bottle instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work, will need to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: learn how to use
customer_reviews.text: decided to keep love it when I learned to use it the right way
customer_reviews.author: Pat Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great time saver and you get clean windows
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Weed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome window cleaning product! Say NO to the dripping on the floor!
customer_reviews.text: Since I have so many windows in my home, and usually need to put a towel down underneath the window I am cleaning when using a regular squeegee, due to the enormous dripping and this item popped up when I was looking at their floor cleaner - I had to give it a try. OMG!!! It is AWESOME! No more cleaning up the dirty water on the floor after I am done cleaning the window!!! I literally walked around the house looking for more windows/mirrors/glass doors to use this on! 5 stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: It's not about what you see, it's about what you DON'T see. This Karcher window cleaner/vacuum is mind blowing.. I have cleaned our windows annually since we bought this house. Aaaand I've hated doing it every time. We have big dogs. Big indoor dogs that are the love of our lives, but you can imagine what the windows looked like. I have to clean "their" windows once a month, and it's backbreaking. This is game changing. This took me 10 minutes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drea C.

customer_reviews.title: Bye-Bye sweaty windows! Lightweight, Easy-to-use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely for removing condensation on my windows. It has well surpassed my expectations. (Video: small bathroom window. Pictures: water receptacle, emptying water, entire set) The amount of water, DIRTY WATER, that I got off of each window was amazing. The vacuum weighs nearly nothing. When using it, I do not need to apply pressure. It’s basically a squeegee into a vacuum container. Simple but smart! I haven’t tried the cleaning portion but I can see from the vac alone that it was worth the price for my home not to have dripping winter windows!! Perfect chore for a child too because it’s kinda fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: ncAmamzonWoman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This came up on my news feed in FaceBook. I read the reviews and was intrigued. I saw a lot of the reviews were because this was this was free and needed more reviews. I tried it out today and it took my breath away. My windows have never looked cleaner. I was shocked at how dirty the water was in the reservoir. Granted, I’ve never really cleaned my windows before but I can’t think of a more fun and exciting way to do it!! The window cleaner soap smells great!! Over all, A plus. Super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hack

customer_reviews.title: Only wish I knew of this product sooner
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on the gamble it would actually make cleaning the many windows in our house easier. And it worked beautifully. You spray on the solution, and this device easily "vacuums" up the dirty water, so you don't have to keep wiping to get rid of it. And it doesn't leave streaks. But even better, it actually cleans all kinds of surfaces. So it will tackle outdoor tables, windowsills, etc. It's fantastic, and I bought another one for my father.
customer_reviews.author: SBT

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little machine, but can leave streaks, if not used at the right angle
customer_reviews.text: I like this little machine a lot, as it prevents dirty water from running over the lower window frame. Instead, it sucks it into its little tank. However, I learned that you need to be careful to always hold it at the right angle to the glass, or it will leave streaks. Since this is not always possible, you still have to go over the glass with a microfiber towel after using this gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: A Must For Those Who Like Streak Less Windows and Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Karcher Window Cleaner! I could not image not having this if you have glass shower doors! It does an amazing job of cleaning without streaks. I bought a second one for my son and daughter-in-law. Cleans shower doors, mirrors, countertops, windows best of all if charged you can clean all your glass WITHOUT A MILLION PAPER TOWELS!
customer_reviews.author: Oldschool63

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be a streaker - this thing works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works, and I am not a big Karcher fan. The windows get exceptionally clean, easily. The concentrated solvent is superb, and I had no steaks anywhere, and used the unit sideways. My only worry is what happens when my squeegee gets old.
customer_reviews.author: RT7765 BOB

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: Leaks all over! For 80 bucks... It is exactly the same as buying a regular squeege. No advantge with this one
customer_reviews.author: Mike m

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We live in an RV and moisture on the windows is a big problem from November - March. This is great at removing all the water from the windows in a fraction of the time it used to take me. Before I had a squeegee and a sponge. Tedious! This makes life simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Myrick

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried washing our two sliding glass doors and three large picture windows that cover an entire wall of our home and look out onto the water, but I've never had any success - they always end up streaky, not totally clean, and I'm exhausted from the effort. This tool is the best thing ever! It was very easy to use, did an amazing job, and my windows have never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Fauro

customer_reviews.title: Easy Window cleaning device
customer_reviews.text: This window cleaning device is not perfect, it still leaves some streaks on the glass which you only see later when the sun hits the window, but it is better than anything else we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pruckmayr

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning shower tiles and glass
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit pricey, this product does a great job and avoids pools of water gathering in the base of the shower, all set to produce mold!
customer_reviews.author: Una

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would HV Ave bought this a long time ago. Works outstanding, make sure your at the right angle. Saves so much time for a super clean window or mirror. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Triz_Megistus

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: so happy I bought it cleans great my windows and glass table are clean ,shiny as they have not been in a long time no stripes just squeaky clean.
customer_reviews.author: harpy Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Clean windows better than anything with ease!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine! I already have one and purchased this as a gift and they love it as well!! It’s an amazing gadget. Wouldn’t be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning windows so easy
customer_reviews.text: Great little product for cleaning windows - leaves then completely dry and clear and so easy to use. Battery life very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Shower
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy way to keep shower tiles dry and mildew-free. Light weight and easy to maneuver. Works even better than expected. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: librtea

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a LOT of windows and goodness is it easy to clean with this product and it cleans them so well. I also use it to clean mirrors and finally streak free. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Agata

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Great
customer_reviews.text: Life changing device. All of the Karcher equipment is superb. Second window squeegee for me
customer_reviews.author: John D. Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: If you are debating getting this, don’t. Just get it bought!
customer_reviews.text: If you have windows to clean this will get the job done better and quicker than you can imagine. Don’t even bother debating it. Get it bought!
customer_reviews.author: Miss J V Garsden

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb. Love it, love it, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mercurio

product_meta.title: Karcher WV 1 Plus Window Vacuum
product_meta.description: Style:WV1PLUSThe WV1 Plus Surface Cleaner provides fast, drip-free, streak-free cleaning. Lightweight at 1. 1 lbs, the WV1 eliminates paper towels and cleans any smooth surface in the home. Great for windows, mirrors, shower tile and doors, countertops, and vehicles. Includes Window Vac and spray bottle with washable microfiber pad.
feature_bullets: Dirty water tank capacity (ml) 100. Drip-free - built-in vacuum collects dirty water as you clean
Rechargeable, lithium-ion battery provides cordless freedom
Lightweight, compact design is easy to maneuver and hold
Includes Window Vac, spray bottle, machine washable microfiber pad, detergent sample, charging cable
Made by Karcher – the original inventor of the Window Vac
Designed and Engineered in Germany; produced in Italy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars328 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
